name: Inverted-Quality
author: thesixthroc
title: Inverted Quality (Beta)
description:
Inverts Quality into a new system, Degradation.

Mined and smelted items start at Nominal degradation. Each time an item is crafted, it has a 90% chance to become more degraded.

Three new entities are provided: Downgrade Port allows low-degradation items to be used in high-degradation recipes; Meltdown Facility allows the melting down of highly degraded items back; and a Burner Assembling Machine to avoid a softlock in the early-game.
